title: Amaro (Padre)
body: Padre Amaro was the name of a famous periodical published in London, in the Portuguese language, from 1820 to 1830, with the illustrious Madeiran Joaquim Jos√© Ferreira de Freitas as its main editor, also known by the name of Padre Amaro, whom we will address in the appropriate place.

1820: Start of the publication of the periodical in London
1830: End of the publication of the periodical in London
